texts: I want help with github issues.
Can you help me with github issues?
Please help me with github issues.
How can I create a github issue when a crash occurs.
stop creating a github issue on a crash
Open an issue on an app crash
Begin tracking application crashes with github issues

parameters.name: repo
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the repository you want to open issues against?

parameters.name: user
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the username associated with the github repository?
